attributes.action: Replace speed cameras with speed sensing traffic lights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
First saw these in Italy where as you approach a speed sensitive area the traffic light overhead senses your speed and if you are speeding it turns the light to red for about 20 seconds.  A bit like a stop and go penalty in motor racing.

A lot us slow down for cameras beacause we know they are there and with the cost of them these speed sensing traffic lights could be a good and effective alternative.
